unnormalised: Sangati kamank lagun konnakui adres kortana, sarkem title zanna zai. Udharonnak, "CEO" mhanllear Chief Executive Officer, ani "CFO" mhanllear Chief Financial Officer. "MD" chodd korun Indian company-amnim Managing Director mhunn vollkhotat. "Mr." vo "Ms." tankam naka mhunn sanglea shivai vo zori tanchim "Dr." vo "Prof." sarkhim professional title nasleat tor, tanchya navam adim vapurna borem. "Shri" vo "Smt." Indian bhaxamnim chodd vaprotat torui, "Mr." ani "Ms." English vyavharik bhashnnan chodd vollkhotat ani tankam chodd man ditat. Dhakllea dovrunakai ki "VP" mhanllear Vice President.
normalised: Tumchea mahite khatir, tumi eka vevsayik vatavarnant konak ulo kortana, tankam sarkem title mahit asop bore. Udharonnak, "C-E-O" mhunnttlear Chief Executive Officer, ani "C-F-O" mhunnttlear Chief Financial Officer. "M-D" chodd korun Bharatiya compenyant Managing Director mhunn vapurtat. "Mister" vo "Miss" tankam apnachem naam sangche adim vapurnnem bore, na zalear tanchem professional title aasa zalear "Doctor" vo "Professor" vapurnnem bore. "Shri" vo "Srimati" Bharatiya bhasant samanya assa, punn "Mister" ani "Miss" Inglez vevsayant chodd samaztat ani tankam chodd mandtat. Ugddas dovortat ki "V-P" mhunnttlear Vice President.
text: Sangati kamank lagun konnakui adres kortana, sarkem title zanna zai. Udharonnak, "CEO" mhanllear Chief Executive Officer, ani "CFO" mhanllear Chief Financial Officer. "MD" chodd korun Indian company-amnim Managing Director mhunn vollkhotat. "Mr." vo "Ms." tankam naka mhunn sanglea shivai vo zori tanchim "Dr." vo "Prof." sarkhim professional title nasleat tor, tanchya navam adim vapurna borem. "Shri" vo "Smt." Indian bhaxamnim chodd vaprotat torui, "Mr." ani "Ms." English vyavharik bhashnnan chodd vollkhotat ani tankam chodd man ditat. Dhakllea dovrunakai ki "VP" mhanllear Vice President.
